>
[South Wind's Scorch Song](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1076)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 190 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_ is always warm to the touch, nearly unbearably so. Lines of crackling flame radiate from carnelians affixed to its curved and blackened blade, and its pommel ends in a brilliant tassel of [phoenix](/Monsters.aspx?ID=330) feathers. While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a _greater striking_ rune and +4 for _major striking_.
